Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier medical emergency on the tracks near Pulaski. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier medical emergency on the tracks near Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses are available between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
